member.name: T:Indexer.aConcurrentList`1
member.summary: A thread-safe list with support for: 1) negative indexes (read from end). "myList[-1]" gets the last value 2) modification while enumerating: enumerates a copy of the collection. Taken from StackOverflow http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9995266/how-to-create-a-thread-safe-generic-list.

member.name: P:Indexer.aConcurrentList`1.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: support for negative indexes (read from end). "myList[-1]" gets the last value

member.name: T:Indexer.Document
member.summary: A document that has been indexed by the index engine.

member.name: M:Indexer.Document.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty Document object. Creation of the object structure is relegated to the application using the object.

member.name: M:Indexer.Document.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a populated Document object. GUID and timestamp are added automatically.
member.param: URL or other handle to access the document on persistent storage (managed by the caller).
Source of the document (managed by the caller)>
Name of the user adding the document (managed by the caller).
Byte array data from the source document.

member.name: P:Indexer.Document.DocumentID
member.summary: Integer uniquely representing the document; typically used if stored in a database.

member.name: P:Indexer.Document.Title
member.summary: Title of the document. Supplied by the caller.

member.name: P:Indexer.Document.Description
member.summary: Free-form text description of the document. Supplied by the caller.

member.name: P:Indexer.Document.Handle
member.summary: URL or other handle to use when attempting to reach the content. Supplied by the caller.

member.name: P:Indexer.Document.Source
member.summary: Source of the content, i.e. YouTube, Vimeo, web, etc. Supplied by the caller.

member.name: P:Indexer.Document.AddedBy
member.summary: Free-form text describing who added the document. Supplied by the caller.

member.name: P:Indexer.Document.ReferenceGuid
member.summary: GUID for this document. Assigned by the index engine.

member.name: P:Indexer.Document.Added
member.summary: UTC timestamp when the document was added. Assigned by the index engine.

member.name: P:Indexer.Document.Data
member.summary: Document contents in byte array form.

member.name: M:Indexer.IndexEngine.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: Path and filename of the Sqlite database.

member.name: P:Indexer.IndexEngine.DatabaseFile
member.summary: Path and filename of the Sqlite database.
